Object.Name: Location
Object.Description1: This LwM2M Object provides a range of location telemetry related information which can be queried by the LwM2M Server.

Item.Name: Latitude
Item.Description: The decimal notation of latitude, e.g. -43.5723 World Geodetic System 1984.

Item.Name: Longitude
Item.Description: The decimal notation of longitude, e.g. 153.21760 World Geodetic System 1984.

Item.Name: Altitude
Item.Description: The decimal notation of altitude in meters above sea level.

Item.Name: Radius
Item.Description: The value in this resource indicates the radius of a circular area in meters. The circular area is used to describe uncertainty about a point for coordinates in a two-dimensional coordinate reference systems (CRS). The center point of a circular area is specified by using the Latitude and the Longitude Resources.

Item.Name: Velocity
Item.Description: The velocity of the LwM2M Client, as defined in 3GPP-TS_23.032.

Item.Name: Timestamp
Item.Description: The timestamp of when the location measurement was performed.

Item.Name: Speed
Item.Description: Speed is the time rate of change in position of a LwM2M Client without regard for direction: the scalar component of velocity.
